name: Everyone's a Wally - Remix
description:
v0.8

The classic ZX Spectrum game Everyone's a Wally, remade using GameMaker: Studio 2, including new features and some more to be added in later versions (including full colour sprites, tiles, etc).

The game is currently going through public testing phase, so is now available to download. In its current state it is complete-able.

If you have any feedback or discover any bugs, please leave a comment.

Keyboard controls: 

Arrows and Ctrl, or Q, A, O, P and SPACE. 

Numbers 1 - 5 to switch characters.

Shark chase: Hit jump repeatedly to escape.

Controller:

I recommend playing with an Xbox controller or compatible if you can. The bumper buttons allow you to switch characters.
